## Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like.

## Use Case
Explain why this feature would be useful and how you would use it.

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you think this could be implemented (optional).

## Example
```java
// How the feature might look in code
Element element = vibe.find("button");
element.newMethod();  // Your proposed API
```

## Alternatives Considered
Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

Add any other context, screenshots, or references here.
